### Exercise 2

...

```{r}
library(magrittr)
mets <- Teams  |>
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYN")
my_mets <- mets |>
  dplyr::filter(yearID %in% 2004:2012)
my_mets |> 
  dplyr::select(yearID,G,W,L)
my_mets
```

### Exercise 3

...

```{r}
mets_ben <- Teams |>
  dplyr::select(yearID, teamID, G, W, L, RA, R) |>
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYN" & yearID %in% 2004:2012)
mets_ben
```

```{r}
mets_ben <- mets_ben |>
  dplyr::mutate(RS = R)    # new name = old name
mets_ben
  
```
